title: GSA Public Buildings Service: reports of >90% RIF in Northwest Region (Region 10)
summary:
Government Executive reported that GSA issued RIF notices to more than 90% of
roughly 200 Public Buildings Service employees in its Northwest region, as
part of broader workforce reductions that also targeted the CFO's office and
TTS/18F. The scale is contested across sources; present media tallies
alongside any official statements or union counts.

sources.title: GSA continues slow drip of RIFs, nearly wiping out entire offices

notes:
Use GovExec's specific reporting for Region 10 (Mar. 7) rather than Wikipedia
summaries. If GSA/OPM release official numbers later, update to reflect exact
figures.
